name: Chattanooga Adopt-A-Drain
description: Forked from the OpenOakland project for the OpenChattanooga project. This project allows citizens of Chattanooga to adopt a storm drain. This app encourages the users to help keep their adopted drains clear, or to call the city when the drain is in need of repair. This app will be especially helpful in flood prone areas.

name: AU-Tech
description: AU Tech is a concept for apps and design in the precious metals industry. Currently this site has scientific information on precious elements, and an interactive scrap calculator for gold, silver, platinum, and palladium.

name: Aller
description: Aller is a concept website for nature and adventure based design. It is an attempt to take the adventure and beauty of the outdoors, and create rich web spaces from those experiences.

name: Choo Choo Rentals
description: Locally owned and operated since 1982. Choo Choo Rentals offers a wide variety of housing options that includes a 24/7 maintenance staff. From duplexes to single family, Choo Choo Rentals has affordable options to fit your needs.
